attributes.action: help, If you won't scrap the tv licence, at least give us the option to opt out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE would like to be given the choice to opt out of the bbc tv licence. Let the bbc stand on its own two feet like any other company in the uk. How many thousands of petitions are signed each each to scrap the tv licence and are then ignored or some rubbish excuse is given for why we should fund the bbc. people only pay the fee because the threat of £1000 fine is just something they can't afford. i thought demanding money with menaces was illegal. why has the bbc been allowed to do it for so long!! i feel like i've been robbed. why pay for something you don't use?
